import sys

def devu(minValue, maxValue, T):
	
	check = 'No'
	if( minValue <=T <= maxValue ):
		check = "Yes"
	print check

def main():
	NQ = map(int, raw_input().split())
    
	A = map(int, raw_input().split())
	T = []

	minValue = min(A)
	maxValue = max(A)

	for i in range(NQ[1]):
		T = int(raw_input())
		devu(minValue, maxValue ,T)

main()
